name: Data Backup Data File
summary: Learn about .NBD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Prosoft Engineering Data Backup PC has been discontinued.

description: Backup file created by Data Backup Windows backup software; may include user and system files; uses compression to reduce the file size; may be created manually by the user in Data Backup or from a .NBK backup job.
